data.message:
I've never been afraid to show myself as a poet, 
Been goin at it like I'm an addict but they didn't know it, 
They didn't know I could spit rhymes spew Venom with spit shine, 
Write a sick line almost get killed and come back for the sixth time, 
It's crazy, I didn't choose rap, rap fuckin chose me,
This whole industry is full of unrealistic phoneys, 
The devil told me if I stand with God he would disown me, 
Said people wouldn't know me that I would be cold and lonely,
